website_summaries.verdict: Although this is a lower-priced monitor, there are others out there with more features for less money.
pros: Has 8 lullabies programmed into the system
cons: Video quality is less vivid than some other contenders

customer_reviews.title: Great baby 👶 monitor The easiest way to connect I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great baby 👶 monitor The easiest way to connect I have encounter Simply plug in the camera and turn on the monitor And you can see talk and listen Up to 980ft (yes we measured) Night vision Great value for your money don’t spend on expensive baby monitors Recommended (I’ve added a video of my puppy so you can get an idea of the picture quality .. which is good)
customer_reviews.author: DANA SHAUL

customer_reviews.title: I've loved this monitor until this last week
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this monitor until this last week. I have used it for maybe 3 months. Now I can't hear my child crying. The screen turns on but I can't hear anything other than a ticking. Even with the VOX on low all I hear is ticking. I can't find a number for customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Where's my kid???
customer_reviews.text: The night vision is AWESOME....if the lights are on!!!! If you don't want to be able to see or hear your kid, this is the monitor to buy!!! 2 stars because of the 2 features that actually work - temp and talk back feature. I really, really wanted to like this! Boo! Here's a side by side of infant optics to show just how terrible the night vision is on Hello Baby. I even had the brightness maxed out.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Yashenko

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this please!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor around six months ago. I only use it at night time but it completely crapped out on me two weeks ago. I can’t charge the video monitor even with outside chargers. I called hello baby (which Is apparently UK based) and they can’t do anything for me. And all Amazon did was give me a $15 credit. This is ridiculous. The product is barley six months old and they won’t help me. I didn’t even want a full refund I just wanted a replacement monitor. Please do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Meredith @ Pandora's Books

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm really loving this baby monitor! I can go all the way out to my back yard and it still gets service and stays connected! This is the main reason we got it. So I can come out back with my 3yr old and play, and not worry about not hearing his brother if he wakes up. I will update if I find any cons with it but so far it's all pros ;)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Priest

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, dangerous. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked okay the first couple of times it was used but decided that it would constantly switch to VOX Mode at inconvenient and dangerous times. On top of that, VOX Mode’s sound did not work. If I was not close-by, my baby could have flipped out of her crib. As soon as this POS switched to VOX Mode, I ran to the nursery, just in time. I would not, in a million years, recommend this monitor. Ever. It’s unreliable and could put a child’s life at risk. Yes, this stupid thing is relatively cheap but it’s not worth it. Pay more for a dependable model, in this case, more is better.
customer_reviews.author: Sb1983Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Signal ended up throwing away
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was garbage. I am not sure if I got a defective monitor, but I bought it and then didn't open it until over 2 months later ( I know, my own fault) The monitor didn't work through two closed doors less than 10 feet away. My childs room is across the hall and this would only get a signal if both doors were open. Tried to take this outside, couldn't even get a signal when I was standing outside my living room window looking in on my children. I couldn't return it because I didn't open it until after the time had passed, but the doesn't change the bad quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is I wish the battery lasted longer. And maybe the green light in the camera. Every now and then it catches my baby’s attention and I cannot get him to sleep. My camera doesn’t usually switch into day time mode but I think it’s the way I have the camera positioned. I don’t mind the gray picture. I can actually see his breathing movements if I zoom in. I would definitely recommend this camera system. The best thing is you don’t have to worry about hackers because it doesn’t use WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Sway Rippin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible "Night Vision" - Don't Waste $$
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst video baby monitor set I've ever used. You cannot even see in the rooms at night. It's a blur of pitch black and grey pixels. Very disappointed and definitely do not recommend! Camera quality is like looking at someone's crappy cellphone video through a telescope while drunk. The night vision on my cameras does not resemble the nice, clear images posted by other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT CONNECT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this product got so many good reviews. It worked for one day if that. My monitor kept saying trying to connect. We read the manual and followed all the instructions and still didn't work. Very disappointed that it didn't work for us! I really liked all the features I read about online. Oh well, in the process of returning!
customer_reviews.author: Mychelle

customer_reviews.title: AFFORDABLE!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you have to pay this is a very high quality camera. I didn't have my expectations to high because it was the fraction of the price of leading brands. I was pleasantly surprised though. The screen does not have to be plugged in a stationary place so I can go about the house and watch her at all times. It is not wifi so for me who lives out in the middle of nowhere that was a plus. The range is pretty good. I haven't tested that to much but I have would highly recommend this if looking for affordable baby monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in 15 Months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this monitor at first, especially because of the temperature censor. But we are 15 months out and the sound doesn't work. It comes on in spurts for a few seconds at a time and that's it. I have a Summer Infant monitor I bought used 8 years ago that still works fine, but this one barely lasted a year. And broke not long after the limited 1-year warranty. Disappointed that I have to buy another monitor, this one was supposed to outlast the need to have a camera monitor for my child. I should have spent more money for a quality monitor.
customer_reviews.author: jobody

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality and performance for the price was unexpected! I thought "low price, cheap unit, won't last". I have to say I was wrong. Compared to an over-priced version purchased 15 years ago, this is a gem for our purposes, which is to keep an eye on my medically fragile adult daughter at night. The battery does not last long, but the instructions are clear: keep it plugged in whenever possible. That works. I keep it plugged in on my night stand, and can unplug it to use as a flashlight when I peep into my daughter's room should I need to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for toddler
customer_reviews.text: The price point of this monitor is fabulous. The quality of the picture is great. It has all of the basic features you need and not a ton of bells and whistles. It is simple to use.. I like this more for my toddler than I would an infant. It doesnt pick up sound quite as well as other monitors I've used. The battery life is amazing. It lasts forever. The screen on the parent unit stopped working about a year into owning it and the company honored the warranty in exchange for a review.
customer_reviews.author: hbh

customer_reviews.title: Small screen, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hello baby monitor we have had in less than 2 yrs. Our first unit the parent monitor dc charging jack broke of into the monitor and wouldn’t charge. The screen on that monitor was wider and we could see everything. I ordered this unit and was instantly disappointed in how small the screen is. It’s very tough to see what’s going on when looking from afar. This second monitor we have had less than 4 months and screen has went out. The screen out of nowhere just went completely white. I reseted the monitor no change. Very disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I would highly recommend resetting and re-pairing the camera and monitor just out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: So far this works very well. I had issues with the 2.4ghz signal interfering with the internet on devices still running 2.4ghz around my house. I contacted customer service and they advised to reset the receiver and re-pair the monitor and camera. I did this and had no more issues with interference. The picture and audio are what I expected from any baby monitor, much clearer though than our old Samsung monitor and less expensive. The device does 'feel' light and cheap but this has no baring on how well it performs. I've only owned it for approximately 1 week so keep that in mind. I'll return to update this if anything else comes up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I lived this monitor at first. Fast forward to a couple years later when we had to add in the second camera. The night vision is TERRIBLE on camera 2! I can't even see my other child on it. The part of the monitor with the screen doesn't work anymore! It's a plain white screen. I won't be buying this monitt again or recommending it. The first the monitor broke, I contacted the seller and they replaced it. I contacted them again a few times and no response!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this one vs the one that connected to wifi
customer_reviews.text: The size of this parent control is comparable to a cell phone just thicker. Love this one vs the one that connected to wifi. Can monitor both babies rooms with one parent control. Plays lullaby if needed from tthe parent control - each room controlled separately. The best thing is this one has better range and MUCH better battery life. The old one would lose connection from our detached garage (which is not too far away) and this one keeps signal no problem. This one also has a GREAT long lasting battery in the parent base, it lasts hours which will be great this summer when we are at the pool or doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: KCant

customer_reviews.title: Great...for the first 1.5 years
customer_reviews.text: This product was “okay”. Kind of difficult to figure out the remote, unless you grew up with an old cell phone (clicking a button so many times to get what you want). Also the battery slowly started going bad after about a year. It didn’t hold a charge after 3 hours probably. At 1.5 years, it stopped charging all together. Never had any issue with the monitor itself though!
customer_reviews.author: Jess Palmer

customer_reviews.title: 1st monitor lasted 14 months, 2nd lasted less than 6 only a blank screen shows
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice. The first monitor lasted me 14 months. Pretty good for running all night long plugged in and throughout the day for naps. Microphone is clear enough for baby To hear me to find comfort. My first one, you couldn’t hear any fuzzy sound while on, it only made noise when baby did. Second monitor picks up his rain noises so it’s always got a little fuzzy sound but keeping it on volume 1 you can barely notice, however i bought the second one in March, it’s now September and the screen is white, can’t see my baby. Frustrated this one only lasted less than 6 months. I don’t recommend this anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mama-n-Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this monitor for a little less than a year and a half. It's been a good monitor- good picture, great signal, works most places in our house. Recently the battery life in the monitor has gone WAY down hill- probably exacerbated by the sitter allowing the battery to go completely dead a couple of times this summer. I was please to find a battery on Amazon for about $9 that, so far, seems to be compatible with the unit (after swapping the pinout of the wires in the connector) and is working. Hopefully we'll get another year+ out of this unit!
customer_reviews.author: MSU Dawg

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have only used the product twice since we received it in the mail and I personally love it. It’s easy to set up. The picture quality is perfect, I can see my daughter so clearly on the monitor. The volume level isn’t that loud but however the video monitor is so good that I can’t even tell the difference. All the features are neat to have it on the monitor. The battery life is great. Charging was quill which I liked. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tatum Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this baby monitor for 3.5 years and have never had an issue. Only thing that would make it even better is if the camera was portable as well so I could take if to whichever room he'd in without unplugging it and pairing it over and over. Other than that I'm very happy with this monitor especially after surviving for over 3 years and 2 kids lol
customer_reviews.author: Maeghan Grill

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this monitor. The first time was in 2017 and it worked for a year then the monitor stopped working . I repurchased oct 2018 and now the monitor is not charging and won’t stay on. Even when plugged in. Over all it’s a good monitor but these issues are annoying. As many times as I purchased this monitor I could’ve just purchased a better quality one that would probably still be working. Not sure I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much we bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: The VOX has been the most important thing in a baby monitor for my family! I bought $179 Motorola and returned it because it didn’t have the VOX setting. This will be the second time buying the same exact monitor. After 4 years, the 2 way talk has been unreliable. So with our second child, we will continue to use the camera that we have and connect the second camera to the new parent monitor, so we will have two cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this. The camera is good when the lights are on, but the night vision is awful. We have the camera on a dresser about five feet from the crib, but when the lights are turned off, the screen is wavy and blurry, rendering it completely useless if you want to see what your kid is up to. The only thing I like is that the battery on the handheld camera lasted forever. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Goodman

customer_reviews.title: ... it broke after only 6 month but I really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought hello baby (the green one) when my daughter was born and it broke after only 6 month but I really liked it... the picture was great and the volume was just right so I thought I give it another shot and so I bought it again this time in white again it lasted 6 month and is now broken again
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Used only for two months
customer_reviews.text: The monitor and camera are great but it worked only for 2 months. I had to reorder the same one from the same seller. But it was sad that when I asked the seller that camera doesn’t work the seller didn’t bother to answer me at all. The first set I got for my baby shower in November, started using at the end of January and it broke down in March. The second set I ordered from the same seller to see what happens now!
customer_reviews.author: O***

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted? (only 3 months) :-(
customer_reviews.text: Monitor basically broke after 3 months of normal use. Just made some terrible noise, the video froze on screen, audio cut out, and cannot even turn the monitor on or off. Plugging it in to wall charger does nothing. Before that, however, for half the price of those large “High Def” screen ones, it was great. Battery life off the charger was easily a couple days of use or more, picture on small screen was detailed enough, temperature sensor was nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little tech for the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife, an Alzheimer's patient, so I can watch her after I put her to bed. It works wonderfully between floors in a sizable house, good audio and video, and the VOX (sound activation) works well also, goes a long time on a single charge and easy to re-charge. How far this technology has come since my kids were small and we had the audio-only baby monitors? This has minimal setup, basically works right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dieckmann

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked great for the first 6 months or so, but now it CONSTANTLY says "Waiting for Connecting." I might get a visual of my baby on the screen for 1 out of every 8 seconds, and it's really frustrating. I've tried everything from unplugging the camera and plugging it back in, turning the monitor off and on, changing position of the camera and monitor, I've even put them right next to each other. Overall, this monitor is pretty useless to us less than a year after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The night mode is very crisp and clear. It does stay in night mode sometimes during the day if it doesn’t catch enough light but not a big deal. I love the ability to talk through it and that it shows the temperature of the room. The Vox setting is nice to save battery life and is great b/c it only turns the camera on if there’s noise. The lullabies are kind of odd sounding and baby doesn’t much care for those. All in all, a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheNextEpisode51

customer_reviews.title: Parent unit faulty
customer_reviews.text: Screen goes white for no reason. Got a replacement. Same thing happened in about a month.
customer_reviews.author: C&Dherman

customer_reviews.title: and the night vision's picture quality kinda sucks. I have a 2 story house and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it's not without fault. First, it's painfully clear this is a Chinese-designed and built system as it's on-screen messages such as "Awaiting for Connecting" when it's searching for a signal and "Pairing is Succeed" when it's pairing cameras. I have my camera on the wall about 7 feet from the ground and about 10-12 feet from my daughter, and the night vision's picture quality kinda sucks. I have a 2 story house and the base on occasion (yet seldomly) can struggle to maintain connection with the camera. Overall though, for what it does and what it costs, it's a great option. I would recommend this over any of the horrendously overpriced alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this as a second replacement monitor because after all the beatings we gave our first for the last two and a half years, the monitor screen finally broke. We put that thing through the ringer though. I'd highly recommend this monitor, the picture is just fine, night vision good, battery life normal, and it's super affordable. You can connect up to three cameras, which is really great!
customer_reviews.author: EDDevo

customer_reviews.title: Died after 7 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in July 2019 for baby that was born in November. It wasn't used until then. It is decent and simple to use but one day the screen just froze and we had to wait until the battery died in the monitor to see if it would work again. Once it turned off, we fully charged it up again but the monitor wouldn't reconnect with the camera. We liked it until that happened. The picture quality is okay, there are certainly other monitors that have sharper images but for our purposes it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. This unit replaced our $200 Motorola unit, which had its ups and downs as well. Overall, I do like this one better. The battery life is fantastic, and the range is very good as well. The one down side I could note is that the volume does not go very high. Loud enough to hear for sure, but might not wake a deep sleeper. The parent unit is very lite and slim, and barely noticeable in your pocket. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Benny P.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a video monitor that wasn't too crazy expensive, and this one seemed decent. Well, six months later I am still glad every day that I bought it! The video quality is good, I can zoom in, it shows me the temperature in baby's room, has two-way radio, and the battery life is good, too. Now if it connected to my phone, too, that would make it divine, but overall it's practically perfect! Especially for the price, this is a great product, and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fe

customer_reviews.title: Buy Beware on This Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good: Great features, great camera, night mode works fantastic. The monitor is simple to use and simple to setup. Bad: My issue is that it operates on 2.4gHz. If you already have wireless devices in your home (ex. router, laptops, etc.) that operate on 2.4gHz, you will have connection issues. It will interfere with other devices and cause the monitor not to consistently connect. My other issue is with the technical support for this company. It doesn't exist!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Eveland

customer_reviews.title: Terrific customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had this just short of a year and I used to love it. This week the monitor is black and not showing a picture or making sounds. It always stays plugged in so I know it’s charged. I use this monitor to keep an eye on my son who has seizures so I need it to work. I have emailed the company and await a response since I am within the one year warranty I hope they send a replacement. Update: they sent me a new one in 2 days and it works great
customer_reviews.author: N. Gilbo

customer_reviews.title: But for someone with a baby I would not recommend this. When it looses connection or gets disconnected ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job for me with older kids. But for someone with a baby I would not recommend this. When it looses connection or gets disconnected it doesn’t set off an alarm. So if you are asleep you will never know that it is not working which can be very dangerous!!! It’s nice that it shows the temperature of the room. Also love the ability to talk through it. Quality of picture is great too
customer_reviews.author: Laela M

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: For the price this monitor meets expectations. We've been using this product for two weeks now and it does the job. The volume isn't as loud as we'd like it to be, but you can still definitely hear your baby if it's close to you. For some reason our screen likes to stay on the night screen even when there's plenty of light coming through in his nursery. At times it will show on color [day screen] but the quality overall of the picture isn't bad. I would recommend this monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea E. Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality/lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Well I would have given this product a better rating but I’ve had it 4 months now and for no reason it barely works. Noticed last night the picture quality wasn’t as good as it had been and now today it barely connects. I walk from my daughters room to my room ( down a tiny hallway) and it no longer connects. Sound comes in and out and the video connection just says “waiting for connection”. Really disappointed that this monitor lasted us barely 4 months. I also can’t seem to find any way to contact customer service for the company to get a new one or solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rose

customer_reviews.title: We'll get the obvious out of the way - The ...
customer_reviews.text: We'll get the obvious out of the way - The camera is small. With that being said, you can see my daughter's entire crib when placed in the ceiling corner of the room. It has night vision, it reaches halfway down my street. The quality is clear enough for me to even see my child breathing. You can hook up multiple cameras. For the price you absolutely cannot beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. No issues. Picture quality is good and the night vision works well. Can see the baby very clearly. Love the vox, which puts the monitor on standby until there is movement or noise, which save battery. It has a high and low sensitivity, so my dog going in and out of the baby room will set it off off set to high sensitivity. You have the option to not use vox and monitor will stay on. Can play a lullaby and talk to the baby. Only wish there was a belt clip on the monitor, but it does have a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: Arti

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Range
customer_reviews.text: I put the thing in my brick house, then walked down the street about 300 feet, probably more. Still had a signal. The components are nice and compact/fits in a pocket. Video is clear and has a nice picture. We have a white noise machine in the kidos room and unfortunately the VOX setting can't handle that frequency or whatever science VOX works on. In short, the screen/sound doesn't turn off with VOX because of the white noise machine. Be nice to have a higher VOX setting? PROS: intuitive UI multiple camera support super fair price signal range CON: (notice 'CON' is singular, not CONs) VOX cannot handle our white noise machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan D. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very happy with this monitor. It's very sound sensitive which is both good and bad. It works negatively for us as we keep a box fan running in our sons room for white noise and it picks up so much of the fan noise that it can sometimes be hard to hear if he's up and about. The screen is also a little dark. When you first turn the unit on, the screen display is bright but then it turns darker making it a little hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Glasslover84

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer.  AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The quality of the Image is great and so is the sound. I use a command adhesive strip to stick it to the wall and it hasn't budged (no need to drill holes in the wall). The battery life of the monitor is great. I love that it doesn't need WiFi (so no creepy hacker intrusions). I love this product. And the price is amazing. My friend spent $200 or more on hers and mine has a better resolution (and doesn't do the wierd powers save shut down).
customer_reviews.author: MommaMeli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor for an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this monitor! The picture quality is pretty decent as is the night vision. It is basic but great for the price. We take it with us when we travel and it’s always easy to set up. The sound is great and it does exactly what we need it to, helps keep an eye on baby to make sure she isn’t stuck in any uncomfortable positions as she learns to move.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is really good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor and have been using it for a year it was well worth the money. It doesn't have the best battery life in my opinion but I have never had any other brand of monitor so I don't know how others hold up to this one. I think it does a great job and the sounds is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the money!! We have tried a few monitors over the past couple months. Some of them more than twice the cost of the Hello Baby. This monitor has the best features and is extremely easy to use. The vox settings are especially nice for battery life. The only thing that i would recommend is the addition of a rubberized case for the monitor. Your bound to drop it at some point. This is our second one since our first one came apart after small fall. The power button then broke off and we could not shut it off. This of course meant we needed to constantly have it plugged into a power source. Overall I Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mb18264

customer_reviews.title: Would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE. Audio is clear and volume adjustable. Loud enough at night that when he is crying it wakes me. Night vision is very clear. Zoom is good (pictures show day time nap with and without zoom). Would HIGHLY recommend. Like that you can keep the audio only and turn the visual off to save battery. Was nervous about the small screen but honestly it’s just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Blair K. Lindler

customer_reviews.title: Monitor stopped working after a day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor based other's comments. The setup was a breeze. I didn't have to nothing and it worked right out of the box. Good signal and video quality. I cannot complaint about the features of this device or its quality, but after a day, when charging the monitor, it made some weird static sound and was not charging at all. I kept it charging for a few hours but it was totally out. Didn't come back on or worked at all. I'm giving two stars for the qualify and features. Had it worked ok, this would've been a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. Picture quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is an extra video monitor to use in our camper while camping this summer so that when my 18 month old went to bed I could still hear and see her if we are sitting outside. Works perfect. Picture quality is very good. Night vision is great also. Super easy to use. The tile on the camera is manual so you can't tilt it from the handheld however you can position the camera from the unit to pretty much any angle you need it! Works perfectly very happy with the purchase for the price. Love that it shows the temperature of the room also!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. A clear picture and volume goes pretty high I feel I like I can hear my baby breathing and when she cries it could wake the neighbor. With my first kid I thought I needed a huge screen but this one is compact I can put it in my back pocket and the batterie lasts a while. It has a pretty good range too. Our vacation home has a shop that’s about 100ft from the house and it worked from there to the house
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Good buy :)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE SAME DAY*** This monitor work good with distance as well. I can be down stairs and still have a good view on my baby! Great! Also figured out the volume :) Also I notice you can connect more than 1 camera which is a good thing. I receive my baby monitor a few days ago. I plugged it in right away to see how it really worked. The speaker works great! The picture is clear in the morning and at night. I have yet to figure out the volume but when I do I will update my review. It is easy to set up. Come a little charged to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Celina Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Monitor died in less than a year. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased June 24, 2017 and died on March7, 2018, not even a year. I bought this for my daughter and son-in-law as a gift and it is a nice little unit. Also spent the money and got a second camera. However, less than a year later the monitor is dead so the cameras are useless. There is supposed to be a one year warranty, I will see if that is honored. Once I complete that, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: David Chinn Sr

customer_reviews.title: Camera quality is amazing and I love the settings
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing but it disconnects a freakin lot which sucks when I am in the middle of doing something and all of a sudden it lost signal and I can no longer see my newborn what it does is lose connection to wear I have to have them pair up again and it takes forever to get them to actually pair up, that gives me as a new parent terrible anixtey but overall it's an okay purchase maybe not for 69 bucks of continuous disconnecting but hey still works the majority of the time..
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for a good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera/baby monitor for being a “cheaper” product. The night vision works great, picture is a bit fuzzy but can’t complain for the price I paid. I do wish the screen was a bit bigger but again, can’t complain for the price I paid. I bought this to use as a travel monitor when away from home and it works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: First time Hannah reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought 2 already!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. This is the second one I bought, because my husband broke the monitor while doing yard work. I looked into other brands the second time but came back to this one. The display is clear day and night. And my son loves the music it plays! He’s been used to this since he was an infant so I had to buy this one again. It’s a great price. I can also take it anywhere in the house and even down the road to the bus stop without losing he connection. Great gadget!
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love this video baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this video baby monitor. Initially I had a problem with night vision, it was too dark, but found a fix: I go turn the light on for 30 seconds, or if my kids are sleeping, I take a flash light, turn it on and point it to the camera in the bedroom for a 30 seconds or so. For some reason, after this it works again until a turn it the monitor off or something. But I use this camera mostly during the day, so to me, this is not an issue
customer_reviews.author: Mirela Zaharia

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing set for the price. It's my first fancy monitor but I didn't want to spend over $200 to get one that I could view my baby with. It has all the right settings like room temperature and even lullabies to coax baby back to sleep without even getting off your butt. My favorite part of it is being able to see my sweet little girl without having to disturb her by checking on her and risk her smelling me. Just overall this is a great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked fairly well for a little bit. At the year mark (right when the warranty expires) it stopped holding the battery charge and we started having to keep it plugged at all times. And then it started to expand and open. Not sure how much longer this will last. We believe it is the battery that is swollen. So if you expect to use this for longer than a year choose another brand. The first pic is at 1 year and 1 month and the following pics less than a month after that.
customer_reviews.author: raquel silva

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was delivered to us on June 16th and we loved it... until last month when the charger stopped working. Now the monitor will turn on for a minute or two, beeping loudly that the battery is dying, and then shut off. We really liked this but 2 months of use? I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Regret this purchase - Photos are misleading
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. I think the photos on this page are misleading because in reality, the image is very grainy, and the night vision is mediocre. The camera has to be inches away in order to have a clear picture of your baby. We have the camera mounted on the opposite wall to show a full view of the crib, and we honestly can't see our baby's face or even tell what position he is in or whether he is OK. (I've had to go in and check for fear he could have gotten wrapped up in his blanket.) I would check what the pixel level is on this camera and look for one significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: CECC

customer_reviews.title: First one lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got was great except it only lasted a year then the screen went white. We ordered a new one and had to return it within a week or so because the static on the screen was horrible and the screen kept freezing. We then exchanged it for our third. So far the third is working fine and we’ve had it about 2 months, we’ll see if it lasts more then a year. The sound is great, the night vision is great and monitor is overall good but just disappointed it only lasted a year which is why I give 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Acs

customer_reviews.title: Great temperature sensing monitor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so that we would feel safer running a space heater in the baby’s room. We have a plug that only allows power through when it gets cold enough, but I was worried about him overheating. Having the alarm let’s me rest easier. We like the other features of the monitor also. It’s nice to be able to see him and the battery lasts all day (three naps plus bedtime).
customer_reviews.author: Kaysha

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two of them, and bought one for a gift. It was one of the favourite toys (monitor) of my son, so it's kids proof! 😀 He threw it off second floor ones and it survived. Only thing I would recommend is to be careful when you put monitor to charger, not to demage connection on the monitor. Took it to Europe and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby monitor! I like that it doesn’t need to use WiFi to work and has a long range. I can be outside while my child is napping and the monitor still has a clear picture. The temperature is always accurate and I love knowing that it isn’t too hot or cold in the room! I highly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this monitor. For the price, it's awesome. I didn't want to spend a ton and this is a great, simple, easy to set up and use monitor. The only complaint I have is the screen can occasionally cut out but it's just for a second then goes back to the normal screen. More of an annoyance than anything. I have nothing to compare this to as i'm a first time parent but I would recommend this and would buy it again over the fancy expensive ones anyday. Great clear picture and the battery life lasts a good while if you don't have the screen constantly on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: third one, they fall apart
customer_reviews.text: this is my third one of these in three years. something always goes wrong with the monitor after about 1 year. Why do i keep buying them? maybe cause i'm dumb, but i already had two cameras from this brand and only need it for one more year so here i am
customer_reviews.author: EJ Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fine while it works until the day it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: After having this for about five months the parent unit stopped working. The picture became white and I couldn’t do anything. I reset it and it still didn’t work. I contacted customer service and they sent me a replacement parent unit. That worked for a whole two weeks until the image froze and after resetting it won’t turn on. I would not recommend this item to anyone. Spend the money on a better product. I will say their customer service is great but now I’ve got two non working monitors and I just want my money back so I can buy something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan E. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Only works if no obstacles are in the way
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this item after researching many monitors under $100. Upon setting it up, my first impression was that it does have good video quality. It only has a long range if there are no obstacles in the way. The monitor would not stay connected after closing the bedroom doors. The monitor was in another room, straight across from us, about 30 feet away. It kept disconnecting and would say "Waiting for Connecting" on the screen. I had to return and will have to keep looking for a monitor that can hold a connection through 2 closed doors.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Charging issue...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED it at first, still do really, but my monitor has an issue with the charger cord hole. The plug won't stay in the hole, unless it's rubber banded to hold it in a certain place so that it can charge. The charger cord is not the problem, but the monitor display where the plug goes in has recessed into the monitor itself. It's very annoying to be woken up by the beeping of a low battery when you've had it plugged in all day and while it's currently plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany R.

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only three months ago and the screen on the monitor is already broken. Have no clue how it happened I left it out in my living room came back to it and the inner screen was busted. I’ve had other monitors by different companies that I’ve left around the house or I’ve even dropped and I’ve never had a problem with it breaking so easily. For the money spent I was hoping it’d last more than three months: I have enjoyed this product other than the fact that it is apparently very fragile and easily broken.
customer_reviews.author: btubes

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and straightforward non wifi non cell phone monitor. Plugs in and works great. I'm knocking one star because it beeps repeatedly super loudly when the battery is dying on the monitor and it scares us half to death when it happens. A few beeps would be fine but it chirps like crazy. I understand why (you don't want to wake up and realize the monitor died and your baby is screaming) but it's still annoying. We just keep it charged so it doesn't happen. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sizzle

customer_reviews.title: We have loved everything about this monitor except that our toddler seems ...
customer_reviews.text: We have loved everything about this monitor except that our toddler seems to have crazy powers to break it. If he gets it, he doesn't do anything crazy to it, but it messes up and the last time it actually broke. The screen went white and we couldn't find anywhere or anything to help us fix it. However, it is cheap enough and good enough that we didn't feel too bad buying another. Great product, but don't expect world class customer service or help if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect baby monitor. Great quality picture and sound and features and for a great price. And it traveled well! Unfortunately it has a short lifespan. After only one year of owning it, all of a sudden the monitor receiver wouldn’t hold a charge for longer than half an hour so we had to leave it plugged in all the time. And now 1.5 years of use and the sound won’t work anymore. So it’s rather useless without being able to hear any sound. I wish we could’ve gotten more use out of this monitor. We were pleased with the first year where it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is pretty good. It looks pretty sleek and the video ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is pretty good. It looks pretty sleek and the video quality is also very good. I was expecting a bit of bigger screen but still this is pretty good. Sometimes my baby moves her hands in her sleep and the zoom feature is very handy to see if the baby woke up or not. It would have been great if the monitor remote had the option to move the cam but still it is good for the price range. The night vision is also very clear. To be frank i was not expecting this baby monitor to be that good but i'm very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Venkata Praneeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Company, Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor... I had to go through a few to get to a good one, but the company was awesome. They sent me a replacement free of charge and that's the one that works. I don't know what happened with the other two, but the company was fantastic. The third monitor works just like it should. It has two way talk and temperature which are my two favorite parts. I also like that there's music you can play for your baby to hear. You'd have to know I liked the monitor to try it three times. Glad it finally worked!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: It could have been great.... but...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order in less then a year. I bought the same as a replacement thinking it was just a fluke. The monitor was frozen and stopped working in the middle of the night. The replacement order we just got doesn't pair to the camera they sent. Even though when it works it has great range I shouldn't have two defective cameras/monitors in less then a year. Save your money and get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Urso

customer_reviews.title: and dollar for dollar it's the best baby monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these now, and dollar for dollar it's the best baby monitor for the price. I like the long range, which is why we ordered it. It's our traveling one. We take it camping and with us to our condo in Florida or a weekend at Grandmas. We throw it in our suite case and plug it in when we get there. They best part is, it runs off a USB cord (of you want) so we can use it when we dont have electricity and go camping. We have a USB battery pack we plug it into.
customer_reviews.author: PDizz

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT baby monitor. Friends of ours have Samsung and Motorola monitors for $200+, but for $85 this monitor does everything theirs does. The night vision is great but it can be a little annoying with afternoon naps if there is some light but not enough for it - it will bounce between daylight and night vision. Other than that, I love this monitor. The only small thing I wish it had is a clock so I could look at the monitor and know what time it was, but now days its not that crucial because I typically have my phone not to far away.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Ease of mind
customer_reviews.text: This baby monitor has been EXTREMELY helpful in making me feel at ease. I used to check on my baby every 10min in the crib bc I was so afraid of what may happen, but since this arrived, I am at ease. The quality is good, the night vision is amazing and the sound and movement is accurate. I am very pleased. I live in a 3rd floor apartment and I'm able to go downstairs with it when I'm doing laundry and STILL see by baby and unload groceries from first floor parking lot and still get service!! What a life saver. I can breathe.
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicGal

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor but had a battery issue....
customer_reviews.text: The monitor served us well for nearly 2 years, but recently I came to find the case bulging. I disassembled the case to find that the Lithium Battery was the reason and had begun to blow up like a balloon. This is not normal for a battery like this and so we discontinued our use and went back to an older audio only model. I do not think this would happen often, but if you find your monitor looking like this, I would recommend stopping use and disposing off it before the battery explodes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom F.

customer_reviews.title: Night vision is failing
customer_reviews.text: Liked it at first, but the camera seems to be dying after a year and a half of use. The night vision has gone bad and has so much static it is basically useless, and we have to rely solely on the audio to know if our toddler is up. Disappointing as we were hoping to use the multi-camera feature as we have more kids.
customer_reviews.author: mdwrds

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if you could use two monitors to view one ...
customer_reviews.text: This fulfills my needs perfectly. You can monitor more than one camera. It would be nice if you could use two monitors to view one camera, however. Update: 2 1/2 months later the Parental unit developed horizontal lines across the screen. Tried plugging and unplugging the camera and powering off the monitor. Now the units will not pair. I get a continuous "Pairing***". I cannot tell if the camera is even working and I've tried two Hello Baby power cords.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this baby monitor. I had looked at different ones before my son was born and decided on this one because it came at great price. We live in NYC and have a small apartment so we didn't really need a more luxurious baby monitor. Just something that would allow us to keep an eye on him while he slept and we were not in the room. With this monitor, not only can we see him while he sleeps, but we can also talk to him through the mic feature and play lullabies. I really liked this monitor. So much so that I got the same one for my sister who was also expecting a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: No vision at night.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. The daytime picture is great. The night vision passed, until it quit working a month into using it. I don't know how to get a replacement from them, so...the whole point of me buying this was for the night visiin.😕 I don't know a contact for hello baby, so any help on them replacing it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Elliemay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: **Update: the monitor is now purely for sound as the screen is covered with white space and lines. Lowering this review to 1 Star to reflect the poor quality. Overall, you get a decent value for this monitor, however, I have not been pleased with the video quality. The night vision is definitely not crystal clear. I can't even make out my LO in her bed. Daytime viewing is better, but even then it constantly switches back and forth from daytime to nighttime viewing (automatically) and can be hard to get clear views then as well. Wishing I had opted for a better quality monitor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED**. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATED** Company contacted me and sent a replacement after my initial review. Great customer service! So far so good on the new one. Hoping the first was just a lemon! My only complaint is the VOX mode cuts out after only a few seconds. This was great until it stop working. Haven't even had it for a month and the screen has gone black. Really bummed because it was great while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: GracieRN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reception at the Max distance.
customer_reviews.text: Great room monitor! I put this in an electronics room that is at the maximum range for this monitor to pick up. It is so incredible. No more worry or running out regularly to check the electronics. I put it on VOX (voice activation) and I can hear and see the room clearly and make sure there are no problems I am not aware of. Incredible peace of mind. Great, great monitor. Plug in and its up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Our Go To Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is reasonably priced for what it offers. I have two cameras connected to the monitor and can easily switch between the two. Sound is good. The picture isn’t as clear as advertised but I can still see my kiddo. The night/day vision doesn’t always switch but it could be due to lighting in the room. We take ours on vacations and it’s easily set right up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable in less than 4 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd Hello Baby monitor. This was delivered 4-16-2019 but not placed in use until approximately 5/15/2019. It has frequently beeped as if losing connection, resulting in blank reception. Today 6-4-2019 it is malfunctioning so badly that I wish to return it, but can find no provision for doing so. We use it for monitoring the sick room of my husband who is ill with Lewy Body Dementia.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need without being complicated.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well! I really like that you can turn the camera off and just have sound at night. We had an audio only monitor before this one and the light was so bright in our bedroom at night! I also really love the lullaby feature. When I put my little one to bed and she starts fussing that works so well to get her to sleep! Well done Hello Baby! Update: After having this monitor a few months my only complaint is it is going into VOX mode even though I have the feature turned off. Due to this, I lowered my rating to 4 stars. Other than that, I am still very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMcD

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a highly sensitive mic
customer_reviews.text: great long lasting battery, it also has great range. I was outside in my backyard and my bedroom is all the way upstairs. The video was perfect and I could see my child sleeping. The microphone is especially nice on this unit because it picks up even the smallest little whisper. Which is very helpful even when the baby moves just a little bit and give you a head start before she starts crying loudly. I highly recommend this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi B

customer_reviews.title: Adequate at best.
customer_reviews.text: Night vision was overly grainy. That combined with a small, poor quality screen made viewing very difficult. Range was adequate. Sounds was adequate. Update: A day after posting a two start review I was contacted by the company, which offered me a full refund. This attention to customer service is a good sign that they care about their product. A second email from then asked me delete my two star rating. Perhaps that's why this monitor has such a high rating? Instead, I'm updating this post and giving them 3 stars for the customer service effort.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L S

customer_reviews.title: This one isn't much better because the screen is so small it is difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the screen is too small. This was a replacement for a baby monitor that wasn't working in night vision mode. This one isn't much better because the screen is so small it is difficult to see anything when it is in night vision mode. It's very good for daytime viewing and has great color. I wouldn't recommend if you need good visibility for night time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with both the day and night vision and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm due in a few weeks but I hooked this up to make sure it worked and I was shocked by the quality of the image and all of the features for the price! I am so pleased with both the day and night vision and the sound quality. The lullabies are a nice touch as well! I am so happy this also tells me the temperature in the room so I have one less thing to worry about! I've very happy I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie West

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor gives a clear picture whether room being monitored is lighted or dark . Sound is adjustable. I like the temperature sensor for monitored room. Battery does not last through the night, so use the plug.
customer_reviews.author: SW

product_meta.title: Hello Baby Wireless Video Baby Monitor with Digital Camera HB24, Night Vision Temperature Monitoring & 2 Way Talkback System, White
product_meta.description:
Color:White/BlackHello Baby HB24 portable video baby monitor is a perfect addition to your baby's nursery or bedroom. 

Enhanced 2.4GHz FHSS Technology with range up to 960 ft 
Improved 2.4Ghz FHSS technology to prevent crossed signals and signal drop outs. The monitor has a range up to 960 ft and out of range warning, allowing you to move around the house or yard freely. 

With 2.4 inch Color LCD Screen and 950mAh Battery Receiver 
The receiver has full-color 2.4 inch screen to show real-time video and audio. It has 950mAh battery built-in lasting for 8 hours with screen-on. 

Automatically Infrared Night Vision
Rest assured knowing you can see your baby day and night, including overnight, with automatic night vision.

Room Temperature Monitoring 
The transmitter is equipped with a temperature sensor which is reported on the receiver's screen. You can ensure that it never gets too hot or too cold for your baby. 

VOX Mode 
The screen turns into sleep after 1 minute without any sound in transmitter side if you turn on VOX mode. It will on automatically with sound activated in transmitter side. Receiver works more than 12 hours with VOX on. You can focus on your working or sleep well with VOX on. 

8 Lullabies & 8 Levels Alarm
Lull your baby to sleep with one of 8 polyphonic lullabies or comfort him/her when he/she wakes up. Alarm to remind you to feed the baby in 8 levels setting. 

Sound Activated LED Indicator & Two-way Talk
A row of LEDs on receiver allows you to know the voice of your baby alerting you if he/she is crying when you have the volume turned down. You also could talk back to your baby to comfort him/her via talk button when he/she is crying. 

Pan & Tilt
Rotated aroud 360 degree, up & down 120 degree. You can put it in anywhere and adjust the angel as you want.

Expandable to 4 Cameras
One receiver be paired with 4 cameras.

PLUG AND PLAY & EXPANDABLE TO 4 CAMERAS - Baby camera is plug and play, no set up required. One parent unit monitor can be paired with 4 child unit cameras. (One monitor and one camera included) You could take care all of your kids with one monitor

LARGE CAPACITY BATTERY & VOX MODE - Baby call monitoring last 12 hours with VOX-on (power saving mode), 8 hours with screen-on. VOX mode is power saving mode with sound activated, you could focus on your things until the monitor is activated by child unit sound

IMPRESSIVE MULTIFUNCTIONAL FEATURES - Temperature monitoring and warning; Two-way talk; Optical pan and tilt; Sound activated Led indicator; Screen-off audio only mode; 2X digital zoom; 8 levels Alarms, lullabies playing
